description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5gtvd","text":"SM buffer is used for diluting and storing bacteriophages.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p7vn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u8s","text":"SM buffer contains:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vlsr","text":"200 mM NaCl2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj8me","text":"10 mM MgSO4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ao04i","text":"50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cni3p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak1m3","text":"For storage at -20 or -80° C, 15% glycerol can be added before autoclaving.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c9ln","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b6rj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lcvc","text":"The buffer can keep at room temperature for several months. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1khph","text":"This recipe is for 1 liter of buffer. Make sure to recalculate the measurements if you are making a smaller or larger volume.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25ud0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u86","text":"Ensure that your MgSO4 is a monohydrate before weighing. If not, recalculate amount required to reach correct concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":21,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ptqg","text":"For 1 liter of SM buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bac9b","text":"11.7 g NaCl2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frnub","text":"1.4 g MgSO4 (monohydrate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b59v6","text":"50 mL Tris-HCl, pH 7.5 (1 M)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rb4h","text":"950 mL demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1vhnv","text":"Weigh off  NaCl2 and  MgSO4 and add to a clean 1L blue cap flask or other autoclave safe container.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":15,"length":2},{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"afa3q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"11.7","error":false,"guid":"35AADA505C1911ECAA100B26EA3DEC03","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1.4","error":false,"guid":"39A671F05C1911ECAA100B26EA3DEC03","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9ljd","text":"Measure   Tris-HCl and add to the flask. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fb1o4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"40B452A05C1911ECAA100B26EA3DEC03","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4v19i","text":"Measure   demineralized water and add to the flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"divjp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"950","error":false,"guid":"59558F405C1911ECAA100B26EA3DEC03","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o3ea","text":"Screw the cap on tight and mix thoroughly for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8sove","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"92481CA05C1911ECAA100B26EA3DEC03","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
